queryParams.description: If no kind is given, returns all job offers, if kind is job then lists only jobs, if scope is talent_pool, lists only talent pools
If no scope is given list all job offers. archived returns only archived job offers, active returns published, internal and closed job offers, not_archived returns all but archived jobs
default (default mode, includes most of offer details); brief (only offer’s id, title, status and kind)

queryParams.description: Specifies the number of candidates to retrieve
Skip number of candidates from the begining, used for ‘load more’, offset for next page should be current offset + limit
Show only candidates created after given date
Show only disqualified candidates who are disqualified in at least one job (should be string ‘true’ or ‘1’).
Show only disqualified candidates who are qualified in at least one job (should be string ‘true’ or ‘1’).
List of IDs separated by comma, example: 234221,4211412,535432

Sorting options: by_date, by_last_message
